Uses of Package
org.springframework.transaction.jta

Packages that use org.springframework.transaction.jta
Package
Description
org.springframework.jca.endpoint
This package provides a facility for generic JCA message endpoint management.
org.springframework.transaction.config
Support package for declarative transaction configuration, with XML schema being the primary configuration format.
org.springframework.transaction.jta
Transaction SPI implementation for JTA.
  • Classes in org.springframework.transaction.jta used by org.springframework.jca.endpoint
    Class
    Description
    TransactionFactory
    Strategy interface for creating JTA Transaction objects based on specified transactional characteristics.
  • Classes in org.springframework.transaction.jta used by org.springframework.transaction.config
    Class
    Description
    JtaTransactionManager
    PlatformTransactionManager implementation for JTA, delegating to a backend JTA provider.
  • Classes in org.springframework.transaction.jta used by org.springframework.transaction.jta
    Class
    Description
    JtaTransactionObject
    JTA transaction object, representing a UserTransaction.
    TransactionFactory
    Strategy interface for creating JTA Transaction objects based on specified transactional characteristics.
